name: Doctor Hauzer
overview: In 1952, An investigator searching for the archeologist Dr. Hauzer has disappeared. He built his house over an archeologist site and became obsessed with the deity Kellbim to whom he sacrifices his interns. You will die numerous times in the house's deadly traps but you have unlimited save games so you can viewing the death animations is part of the fun. You can switch the view between first-person, third-person or overhead. Choosing a different view will help you overcome some traps.
